update study_up_info
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
training_unit = #{trainingUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
train_date = #{trainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
